richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"To celebrate Valentine's Day 2022 with members of the Blankets for T.O. community, we organized a virtual movie night on Friday February 18th, 2022, to watch the romantic comedy film ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"Crazy Rich Asians. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"It was open to everyone and was also an opportunity to introduce our group to attendees and connect with other members of the community.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Additionally, attendees were entered into a giveaway which was made possible by student community funding from the University of Toronto Scarborough. Thank you for helping to make these student events possible!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Blankets for T.O. would like to thank everyone that turned out. It was amazing to talk with our members as well as to introduce our organization's goals to attendees.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Stay updated about future events and initiatives via our social media, our website and our mailing list.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: The Blankets for T.O. community joined together for a movie night to connect with the student community and talk about our organization.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The Blankets for T.O. community joined together for a movie night to connect with the student community and talk about our organization.
